items.title: Key infra sectors' growth slows to 15-month low of 3.6% in January
items.content: The output growth of refinery products and fertiliser was in the negative zone. And the pace of increase in the output of coal, steel, and electricity decelerated during the month under review
items.contentSnippet: The output growth of refinery products and fertiliser was in the negative zone. And the pace of increase in the output of coal, steel, and electricity decelerated during the month under review

items.title: OnlyFans paid $15 billion to its creators since launch in 2016: CEO Blair
items.content: OnlyFans is an online content creation platform with about 3.1 million creators. The website takes one-fifth of the payments generated on it and paid about $5.6 billion to its creators in 2022
items.contentSnippet: OnlyFans is an online content creation platform with about 3.1 million creators. The website takes one-fifth of the payments generated on it and paid about $5.6 billion to its creators in 2022

items.title: REC to issue deep-discount bonds to raise Rs 5,000 crore in March
items.content: The state-run financier plans to raise the money through 10-year, deep-discount bonds and the issue is likely to see strong investor demand, the sources said
items.contentSnippet: The state-run financier plans to raise the money through 10-year, deep-discount bonds and the issue is likely to see strong investor demand, the sources said

items.title: Swan Energy raises Rs 3,000 cr via QIP of shares priced at Rs 670 apiece
items.content: The fund will be deployed to modernise the recently acquired Reliance Naval and Engineering's shipyard at Pipavav. a portion of the fund will be allocated for project expansion and debt reduction
items.contentSnippet: The fund will be deployed to modernise the recently acquired Reliance Naval and Engineering's shipyard at Pipavav. a portion of the fund will be allocated for project expansion and debt reduction

items.title: Fiscal deficit at Jan-end touches 63.6% of full year target: Govt data
items.content: In the corresponding period last year, the fiscal deficit or gap between the expenditure and revenue was 67.8 per cent of Revised Estimates (RE) of the Union Budget 2022-23
items.contentSnippet: In the corresponding period last year, the fiscal deficit or gap between the expenditure and revenue was 67.8 per cent of Revised Estimates (RE) of the Union Budget 2022-23

items.title: Zepto launches loyalty programme offering free delivery, discounts
items.content: Quick commerce firm's plan is expected to get one million users in a month
items.contentSnippet: Quick commerce firm's plan is expected to get one million users in a month

items.title: Cabinet approves setting up of three semiconductor plants in India
items.content: Vaishnaw said that the total investment in three semiconductor units is estimated to be Rs 1.26 trillion
items.contentSnippet: Vaishnaw said that the total investment in three semiconductor units is estimated to be Rs 1.26 trillion

items.title: SoftBank Group sells another 2% stake in crisis-hit Paytm to under 3%
items.content: The Japanese conglomerate held a 17.5% stake in Paytm in September 2022. Since then, it has trimmed its ownership through multiple open market deals
items.contentSnippet: The Japanese conglomerate held a 17.5% stake in Paytm in September 2022. Since then, it has trimmed its ownership through multiple open market deals
